title: A new method of modelling liquidity in light of the financial crisis (University of Brighton) ...
text: ( Source : University of Brighton ) One of the most critical factors that investors look for in a financial market is liquidity. Liquidity is defined as the ability to buy or sell significant quantities of a security quickly, anonymously, and
